articles.title: Biden signs bill that raises Social Security payments for millions of Americans - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: President Joe Biden on Sunday signed into law a measure that boosts Social Security payments for current and former public employees, affecting nearly 3 million people who receive pensions from their time as teachers, firefighters, police officers and in othe…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Joe Biden on Sunday signed into law a measure that boosts Social Security payments for current and former public employees, affecting nearly 3 million people who receive pen… [+5487 chars]
